modName: Dragon Reaper Set - Weapon and Armor
summary: Need some good armor and a trusty blade? Here you go!
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6]Dragon Reaper
[/size][/font]Â Weapons and Armor[/center][left]

Contains all weapon types, and Armor slots.
There is a chest in the Whiterun Stables. Middle slot beside the hay.[/left]
Update History
v2.0
Heavy and Light armor
No longer in merchant inventory.

v1.0
Heavy Armor only
May see these in merchant inventories.

Thank you for downloading!!
ENDORSE!!!

Upcoming features:
[s]Light Armor version[/s]
Perhaps different models(if I can figure out how to do it or if someone feels like helping out)
Incorporate a hunt to find the pieces(definitely worthwhile finding them)
Any other stuff I can think of that fits.


Comments are welcome and appreciated, suggestions also appreciated.
